= Introduction =

This page describes how to obtain the source code and build Peacock.

= Requirements =

In order to build Peacock you will need to have the following:
  * Mac OS X 10.5.4 or newer
  * Developer Tools installed (Xcode, Interface Builder)
  * a Subversion client
  * [http://code.google.com/p/helpgenerator/ helpgenerator]
  * [http://www.brockerhoff.net/src/RBSplitView.ibplugin.zip RBSplitView plugin]

= Build Instructions =

== Install requirements ==

Before continuing make sure you have all of the above requirements installed on your computer.

== Obtaining Source Code ==

Follow  the instructions [http://code.google.com/p/peacock-gcms/source/checkout here] to obtain the source code.

== Create Help Files ==

Use the helpgenerator application to create the help files from the skeleton help files.

== Build ==

In Xcode, press "Build".
